info.title: License Manager API
info.description:
## Welcome!

The License Manager API allows you to create users, modify their names and e-mails, as well as add and remove roles from users.

### ATTRIBUTES

|Attribute name | Description |
|:------------|--------------|
|accountName | Account name in VTEX License Manager |
|environment | Environment on which you want to run the query e.g. vtexcommercestable |
|userId      | Unique user identification string |
|roleId      | Integer that represents a role, can be looked up on the License Manager UI |

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

get.description: Returns a list of registered users. The response is divided in pages. The query paramter numItems defines the number of items in each page, and consequently the amount of pages for the whole list.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: numItems
parameters.description: Number of items in the returned page

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Which page from the whole list will be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Chooses the field that the list will be sorted by

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description: Defines the sorting order. ASC is used for ascendant order. DSC is used for descendant order

get.description: Returns a list of available roles. The response is divided in pages. The query paramter numItems defines the number of items in each page, and consequently the amount of pages for the whole list.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: numItems
parameters.description: Number of items in the returned page

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Which page from the whole list will be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Chooses the field that the list will be sorted by

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description: Defines the sorting order. ASC is used for ascendant order. DSC is used for descendant order
